testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlIntersectionSignalInventoryUpdate dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.10.11 [Need to Share Time Synchronization Information] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R365_Authentication_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R365_Authentication_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether External Center Organization is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Content of Device Information Request Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R377_Authentication_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R377_Authentication_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R378_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R378_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R379_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R379_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R378_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R378_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R379_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R379_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R381_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R381_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R380_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R380_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R381_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R381_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R380_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R380_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R386_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R386_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R385_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R385_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R385_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R385_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R386_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R386_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R392_Link_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R392_Link_Identifier_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R396_Linear_Reference_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R396_Linear_Reference_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R397_Linear_Reference_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R397_Linear_Reference_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R397_Linear_Reference_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R397_Linear_Reference_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R396_Linear_Reference_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R396_Linear_Reference_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R401_Route_Designator_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R401_Route_Designator_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R400_Route_Designator_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R400_Route_Designator_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R400_Route_Designator_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R400_Route_Designator_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R401_Route_Designator_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R401_Route_Designator_Supported}

Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R402_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R402_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported}

Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R403_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R403_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported}

Step 34 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R402_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R402_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported}

Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R403_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R403_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported}

Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N96R404_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N96R404_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 37 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationMessage: ${PublicationMessage}
Step 38 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be performed within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationCount: ${PublicationCount}
Step 39 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 40 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 41 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 42 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 43 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 44 CONFIGURE: Identify the Organization Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OrganizationID: ${OrganizationID}
Step 45 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 46 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 47 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}
Step 48 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionResponseMessage: ${SubscriptionResponseMessage}

Step 49 SUBSCRIPTION-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password ORGANIZATIONID = OrganizationID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 50 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.1 IF TMDD_N96R365_Authentication_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.1.1 VERIFY that element authentication exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 50.2 IF TMDD_N96R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.2.1 VERIFY that element organization-requesting exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 50.3 IF TMDD_N96R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.3.1 VERIFY that element device-filter exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 50.4 IF TMDD_N96R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.4.1 VERIFY that element device-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.5 IF TMDD_N96R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.5.1 VERIFY that element network-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.6 IF TMDD_N96R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.6.1 VERIFY that element link-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.7 IF TMDD_N96R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.7.1 VERIFY that element link-designator-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.8 IF TMDD_N96R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.8.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.9 IF TMDD_N96R377_Authentication_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.10 IF TMDD_N96R378_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.11 IF TMDD_N96R379_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.12 IF TMDD_N96R378_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.13 IF TMDD_N96R379_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.14 IF TMDD_N96R381_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.15 IF TMDD_N96R380_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.16 IF TMDD_N96R381_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.17 IF TMDD_N96R380_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.18 IF TMDD_N96R386_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.18.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list
Step 50.19 IF TMDD_N96R385_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.19.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list
Step 50.20 IF TMDD_N96R385_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.20.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list
Step 50.21 IF TMDD_N96R386_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.21.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list
Step 50.22 IF TMDD_N96R392_Link_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.23 IF TMDD_N96R396_Linear_Reference_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.23.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.24 IF TMDD_N96R397_Linear_Reference_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.24.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.25 IF TMDD_N96R397_Linear_Reference_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.25.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.26 IF TMDD_N96R396_Linear_Reference_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.26.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 50.27 IF TMDD_N96R401_Route_Designator_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.28 IF TMDD_N96R400_Route_Designator_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.29 IF TMDD_N96R400_Route_Designator_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.30 IF TMDD_N96R401_Route_Designator_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.31 IF TMDD_N96R402_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.32 IF TMDD_N96R403_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.33 IF TMDD_N96R402_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.34 IF TMDD_N96R403_Uniform_Resource_Locator_(URL)_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.35 IF TMDD_N96R404_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 50.35.1 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.organization-information
Step 50.35.2 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.organization-requesting
Step 50.36 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 50.37 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 50.38 POSTCONDITION: SUBSCRIPTION-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified SUBSCRIPTIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = SubscriptionResponseMessage
Step 50.39 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 50.39.1 PUBLICATION-OC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalInventoryUpdate PUBLICATIONMESSAGE = PublicationMessage PUBLICATIONCOUNT = PublicationCount PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
